name: Slugger (Metallic Walls)
description:
The kid, as he's called, has been locked in his room for 3 years, by his neglectful parents, due to him not having any sort of hobby.  The kid, living in his cramped room for all this time, without having seen the outside world, had his imaginations going wild, to where the trash and toys in his rooms would come to life and start to attack him.  To defend himself, the kid would toss an old baseball and practice throwing darts with his slingshot.  These events caused him to grow tired of being locked up in his room and will finally escape it.

Controls:

Left mouse button: Slingshot darts to eliminate attacking enemies, as well as, bricks

Right mouse button: Toss ball to destroy bricks

Move mouse to move the kid.
